messages.content: I have a proposal I want to add an introduction for, we are moving from running accelerator programs for early stage startups and wanting to run a consulting project for corporations which helps their team members in a similar way to how we help our startup accelerators. We work by helping people identify their values, their purpose and use the unlocked energy and capacity for committed learning and development of soft/universal skills in groups with accountability. Can you help us write an introduction statement that talks about how we have lots of experience with startups and how the work is very similar and how we will be able to take our years of experience and work with hundreds of teams to benefit their business. If you are ready I'll paste some background on Bloom, our company which is looking to offer this corporate client work, summarize what I've requested and why we might be doing this project and tell me you're ready for the background.
Sure, I'm ready to help you with the introduction statement for your proposal. Please provide me with the background information on Bloom and the summary of what you've requested.
